alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 4:47PM MDT until August 18 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Judith Basin County in central Montana... Western Fergus County in central Montana... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 447 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Geyser to near Stanford to 12 miles south of Hobson, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Denton, Hobson, Moore, Geyser, Windham, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Glengarry, Utica, Danvers, Coffee Creek, Hilger, Heath, Buffalo and Benchland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
